product_name: WTB WeirWolf Race Foldable Bike Tire - 26 x 2.1
long_description: The WeirWolf Race foldable bike tire is a different animal entirely. Use it for all mountain riding in wet to dry and hardpack to loose conditions. WTB has added an extra row of transitional tread between the crown and side knobs that gives the new WeirWolf a positive feel and consistent traction at any lean angle. Race model features an aramid bead, versatile and long-lasting DNA rubber compound and lightweight casing.
short_description: The WeirWolf Race foldable bike tire is a different animal entirely. Use it for all mountain riding in wet to dry and hardpack to loose conditions.
